news.title: Erling Haaland is special but Lionel Messi remains untouchable: Barcelona legend's greatest season revisited
news.details: Real Madrid won against Getafe with a clean goal scored by Marco Asensio (70), but the game witnessed an exciting incident when Carlo Ancelotti, the manager of Real Madrid, decided to substitute Asensio with Odriozola in the 84th minute, and indeed the latter left the field.At that moment, Camavinga got injured and requested a substitution, so Asensio returned to the field, and the substitution turned out to be between Odriozola and Camavinga, with the permission of the referee.According to reports, the referee should have prevented Asensio from returning to the field, and Real Madrid should have completed the match with 10 players.According to the

newspapers, known for their bias towards Barcelona, there should be a complaint from Getafe or any other club before Tuesday at 2:00 pm to the Competition Committee of the Spanish Football Federation regarding this incident.The two newspapers pointed out that, according to Article 79 of the Discipline Law, if any club submits a complaint, Real Madrid will lose the match by a score of (0-3) with a financial fine of up to 10,000 euros on the club.
